languages.text: Волей случая, а может лишь по милости Императора кораблю удается выбраться из вязкого космического пространства. Влияние аномалии рассеивается — корабельные системы приходят в норму одна за другой, а изуродованные тела членов экипажа обретают прежние формы, словно и не менявшие свой вид. Теперь только тупая боль в мышцах напоминает о случившемся...

traits.locale_text: Волей случая, а может лишь по милости Императора кораблю удается выбраться из вязкого космического пространства. Влияниее аномалии рассеивается — корабельные системы приходят в норму одна за другой, а изуродованные тела членов экипажа обретают прежние формы, словно и не менявшие свой вид. Теперь только тупая боль в мышцах напоминает о случившемся...

languages.text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.
languages.original_text: Волей случая, а может лишь по милости Императора кораблю удается выбраться из вязкого космического пространства. Влияние аномалии рассеивается — корабельные системы приходят в норму одна за другой, а изуродованные тела членов экипажа обретают прежние формы, словно и не менявшие свой вид. Теперь только тупая боль в мышцах напоминает о случившемся...

traits.locale_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the viscous space. The anomaly's influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

The anomaly's influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

languages.text: 出于偶然或是帝皇的恩典，虚空舰成功地从异常现象的钳制中挣脱出来。怪异的影响消失了，船上的系统一个接一个地恢复正常，船员们变了形的身体也都恢复了原本的样子，仿佛什么都没发生过一样。如今，只有你身上的肌肉隐约传来的酸痛，能证明这件事情确实发生过。
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

traits.locale_text: 出于偶然或是帝皇的恩典，虚空舰成功地从异常现象的钳制中挣脱出来。怪异的影响消失了，船上的系统一个接一个地恢复正常，船员们变了形的身体也都恢复了原本的样子，仿佛什么都没发生过一样。如今，只有你身上的肌肉隐约传来的酸痛，能证明这件事情确实发生过。

languages.text: 偶然か、それとも皇帝の恩寵か、ヴォイドシップは異変の粘り強い掴みから抜け出すことに成功した。船内のシステムは次々と正常に戻り、変形したクルーの身体は何事もなかったかのように元の形に戻る。今では、この出来事を思い出させるのは鈍い筋肉痛だけだ。
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

traits.locale_text: 偶然か、それとも皇帝の恩寵か、ヴォイドシップは異変の粘り強い掴みから抜け出すことに成功した。船内のシステムは次々と正常に戻り、変形したクルーの身体は何事もなかったかのように元の形に戻る。今では、この出来事を思い出させるのは鈍い筋肉痛だけだ。

languages.text: Por casualidad o por la gracia del Emperador, la nave del vacío logra salir de las fuertes garras de la anomalía. Su influencia se disipa. Los sistemas de a bordo vuelven a la normalidad uno tras otro y los cuerpos deformados de la tripulación adoptan sus formas naturales como si nada hubiera ocurrido. El único recuerdo del suceso es un dolor muscular agudo.
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

traits.locale_text: Por casualidad o por la gracia del Emperador, la nave del vacío logra salir de las fuertes garras de la anomalía. Su influencia se disipa. Los sistemas de a bordo vuelven a la normalidad uno tras otro y los cuerpos deformados de la tripulación adoptan sus formas naturales como si nada hubiera ocurrido. El único recuerdo del suceso es un dolor muscular agudo.

languages.text: Ob durch Zufall oder durch die Gnade des Imperators, das Raumschiff kriecht erfolgreich aus der hartnäckigen Umklammerung der Anomalie. Ihr Einfluss schwindet. Die Bordsysteme funktionieren nach und nach alle wieder normal und die deformierten Körper der Crew nehmen wieder ihre ursprüngliche Form an, als sei nichts geschehen. Die einzige Erinnerung an das Ereignis sind stumpfe Schmerzen in den Muskeln.
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

traits.locale_text: Ob durch Zufall oder durch die Gnade des Imperators, das Raumschiff kriecht erfolgreich aus der hartnäckigen Umklammerung der Anomalie. Ihr Einfluss schwindet. Die Bordsysteme funktionieren nach und nach alle wieder normal und die deformierten Körper der Crew nehmen wieder ihre ursprüngliche Form an, als sei nichts geschehen. Die einzige Erinnerung an das Ereignis sind stumpfe Schmerzen in den Muskeln.

languages.text: Que ce soit par un heureux hasard ou par la grâce de l'Empereur, le vaisseau réussit à s'extraire du redoutable champ de force de l'anomalie. Son influence reflue, les systèmes embarqués se rétablissent les uns après les autres et les corps déformés de l'équipage retrouvent leur apparence initiale comme si rien ne s'était passé. Une douleur musculaire lancinante, tel est le seul souvenir qu'ils gardent à présent de cette mésaventure.
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.

traits.locale_text: Que ce soit par un heureux hasard ou par la grâce de l'Empereur, le vaisseau réussit à s'extraire du redoutable champ de force de l'anomalie. Son influence reflue, les systèmes embarqués se rétablissent les uns après les autres et les corps déformés de l'équipage retrouvent leur apparence initiale comme si rien ne s'était passé. Une douleur musculaire lancinante, tel est le seul souvenir qu'ils gardent à présent de cette mésaventure.

languages.text: Tesadüfen ya da İmparator'un lütfuyla uçsuz gemisi, anomalinin inatçı çekiminden başarıyla kurtuluyor. Anomalinin etkisi geçiyor. Gemideki sistemler tek tek normale dönüyor ve mürettebatın şekil değiştirmiş bedenleri, sanki hiçbir şey olmamış gibi eski hâllerine dönüyor. Hadiseden geriye bir tek hafif bir kas ağrısı kalıyor.
languages.original_text: By chance or by the Emperor's grace, the voidship successfully clambers out of the tenacious grasp of the anomaly. Its influence dissipates — onboard systems return to normal one after another, and the deformed bodies of the crew take on their original shapes as if nothing had happened. Now, the only reminder of the event is a dull muscle pain.
